name: Jump for Keys
description:
Jump for Keys is a platformer game. Collect all keys in the level and reach end level to win. You will have to dodge enemies and spikes for don't lose.

This game is under developing, so it will have new updates (fixing bugs, adding new content...). It is my first game, so I am sorry about bugs in the game.

You can follow me on Twitter or on my Web Page (in spanish) to see more information and Devlogs. Thank you so much!
